title: The Vivienne Takes on Hollywood
overview: The winner of RuPaul's Drag Race UK, The Vivienne redeems her prize for earning the title of The First Drag Race UK Superstar and embarks on an adventure to Hollywood, as she prepares to make her first ever music video.In each weekly episode, she is coached along the way by well known Hollywood characters. From voice coaches to acting gurus, and Hollywood producers to choreographers, they all offer The Vivienne their top tips to make it big in Hollywood - and an insight into the underbelly of showbusiness.
